sentence.text: Top 10 genes in the brown module, including angiogenesis containing fibulin like extracellular matrix protein 2 (elastic fiber assembly), fibrillin 1 (cell adhesion mediated by integrin) and secreted protein acidic and cysteine rich (negative regulation of endothelial cell proliferation) were also associated with survival time of colon cancer patients.

entity.text: negative regulation of endothelial cell proliferation

sentence.text: Further analysis revealed that the function of cell adhesion, biological adhesion, extracellular matrix (positive regulation of cell-substrate adhesion) organization, pathways of ECM-receptor interaction and focal adhesion were the significantly changed terms in colon cancer.

In conclusion, SERP2, elastic fiber assembly, cell adhesion mediated by integrin, negative regulation of endothelial cell proliferation, and LINC0219 were revealed to be the recurrence-associated molecular and prognostic indicators in colon cancer by WGCNA co-expression network analysis

entity.text: negative regulation of endothelial cell proliferation
